name: Lionhart Advisors Group
overview:
Lionhart is a global hedge fund and private equity manager focused on delivering strong, absolute, non-correlated annual returns in the following areas; Global Multi-strategy Arbitrage, Global Resources, Private Equity, and Distressed.

We achieve capital appreciation through active trading of our market positions, pursuit of investment opportunities through our presence in multiple markets and a culture that encourages entrepreneurship and the cross-fertilization of innovative investment ideas. We deliver capital preservation through state-of-the-art risk management techniques and in-depth trading experience.
